channel.title: Moritz Kröger
channel.description: Hello! I'm Moritz Kröger, a web developer with a strong focus in JavaScript as well as other emerging front-end technologies.

item.title: Syntax Highlighting
item.description: SVG seems to just work (when supported). Icon fonts seem to fail in weird ways. For instance, you map the characters to normal letters, then the font loading fails and you get random characters abound.

item.title: Manage your SVG icons using Web Components
item.description: SVG seems to just work (when supported). Icon fonts seem to fail in weird ways. For instance, you map the characters to normal letters, then the font loading fails and you get random characters abound.
